name: tamari
tagline: A self-hosted habit and routine tracker with streaks and reminders
description: Tamari is a self-hosted habit and routine tracker with streaks, reminders, and goal management. It provides a clean, mobile-friendly dashboard for daily tracking.

features.title: Routine Management
features.description: Organize morning, evening, or custom routines with flexible scheduling and completion tracking

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Set notifications for habits and routines to ensure you never miss important daily activities

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access your habits and routines from any device with a responsive, touch-optimized design

features.title: Custom Categories
features.description: Group habits by type or area of life for better organization and focused tracking

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Review completion rates and trends to understand your behavior and adjust your approach
